channel.title: Making a skill 99 to start an account? [508]
channel.description:
[508 server]
My question is about how to make a skill (magic in this case) 99 when you log on to start off the account. For instance: "I'm a new player and I'm going to make an account; I log on and have 99 magic to start" how do I do it?
please help.
thank you :)

item.title: Making a skill 99 to start an account? [508]
item.dc:creator: @drumandy drumandy
item.description:
@drumandy wrote:

well I’m using pali’s source, and mage doesn’t work so until i can fix i can’t

but with Pali’s source there isn’t client.java but player.java
thanks :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 26, 2008, 12:23:18 pm[/size][hr]where is the part to change the skills though?

i really need to get 99 mage to start

rep ++ for whoever tells me please

Read full topic

item.title: Making a skill 99 to start an account? [508]
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

Ye it would either be in client.java or player.java what you need to do is go into one of those files and search for the starting skills or something like that. It should be there. I don’t really know what exactly to search for because ive never wanted to do tht, but zi think this would help.
